duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide strategic leadership and technical oversight for the implementation of the IHSS Activity.
Coordinate technical teams, ensure delivery quality, and achieve project outcomes.
Mentor technical experts, support capacity building, and transfer of skills and knowledge.
Foster strong relationships with government agencies, donors, and partners to ensure program activities are technically sound and sustainable.
Contribute to monitoring, evaluation, and reporting through regular updates and progress reports.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree + 15 years of direct relevant experience OR master’s degree + 12 years OR Ph.D. + 10 years. Degree(s) must be in public health, medicine, health management, or similar related field(s)
